Primary Contact: Amanda Barrett, Manager of Residential Services; Phone: 250.575.9196; Fax: 778.436.9476; Email: amanda.barrett@jhscso.bc.ca
Service Details: - Provides 49 units of low income supportive housing for adult men and women (19+) who are at risk of homelessness and require some support to maintain their housing- Supportive housing has proven effective at moving at risk of homelessness individuals to more secure housing, connecting them with the services and supports needed to stabilize and rebuild their lives- Individualized support services to maintain independent living, with outreach as the main method of delivery
Eligibility: Ages: 19 year(s) and upMen and women 19 years of age and older
How to Apply: - Referral available from the website - Complete and fax to Residential Manager
